note.p: Birth: 19 Lower Mount Street, Dublin, Ireland (03 August 1851)
Death: 7 Ely Place, Dublin, Ireland (21 or 22 February 1901)
Education: Trinity College, Dublin. BA (1871), MA

Career: Erasmus Smith's Professor of Natural and Experimental Philosophical, University of Dublin (1881-1901); Honorary Secretary, Royal Dublin Society; developed the electro-magnetic theory of radiation
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1905 vol 75 pp 152-160, plate, signed by Oliver Joseph Lodge
References: Brebis Bleaney, 'Centenary of the Zeeman Effect' in NR 1998 vol 52 pp 131-136
Andrew Warwick, 'Frequency, Theorem and Formula: Remembering Joseph Larmor in Electromagnetic Theory' in NR 1993 vol 47 pp 49-60, plate
Notes: DSB gives death date as 21 February 1901
